dcterms:creator: R. Hanson
dcterms:description: Logarithmic Market Scoring Rules (LMSR) are used for prediction markets, providing a framework for continuous liquidity even in low market action scenarios.
dcterms:title: Logarithmic Market Scoring Rule (LMSR)

dcterms:creator: E. Hertzog
G. Benartzi
G. Benartzi
dcterms:description: The Bancor Protocol facilitates trades by pairing each token against their native protocol token, allowing for continuous liquidity through independent liquidity pools.
dcterms:title: Bancor Protocol

dcterms:creator: H. Adams
N. Zinsmeister
D. Robinson
dcterms:description: Uniswap is a decentralized exchange that uses a constant product market maker model to facilitate token swaps on the Ethereum blockchain.
dcterms:title: Uniswap

dcterms:creator: M. Egorov
dcterms:description: Curve Finance is designed for efficient trades of tokens with equivalent pricing, focusing on stablecoin liquidity.
dcterms:title: Curve Finance

dcterms:creator: Y. Wang
dcterms:description: The Systemization of Knowledge (SoK) for DEXs provides a comprehensive view of recent advances in decentralized exchanges and their automated market maker protocols.
dcterms:title: Systemization of Knowledge (SoK) for DEXs

dcterms:creator: J. Xu
K. Paruch
S. Cousaert
Y. Feng
dcterms:description: This work provides insights into decentralized exchanges (DEX) with automated market maker (AMM) protocols, detailing their functioning and mathematical models.
dcterms:title: Systemization of Knowledge (SoK) for DEXs

dcterms:creator: V. Mohan
dcterms:description: This paper serves as a primer on automated market makers and decentralized exchanges, providing foundational knowledge for understanding their operations.
dcterms:title: Systemization of Knowledge (SoK) for DEXs

dcterms:creator: B. Krishnamachari
Q. Feng
E. Grippo
dcterms:description: This work discusses dynamic curves for decentralized autonomous cryptocurrency exchanges, proposing a method to eliminate arbitrage opportunities.
dcterms:title: Dynamic Curves for Decentralized Autonomous Cryptocurrency Exchanges

dcterms:creator: S. Wang
B. Krishnamachari
dcterms:description: This paper presents a method for optimal trading on a dynamic curve automated market maker, focusing on enhancing trading efficiency.
dcterms:title: Optimal Trading on a Dynamic Curve Automated Market Maker
